channel.title: Squadbusters - News
channel.description: RSS wrapper of Squadbusters inbox News

item.title: Patch Notes!
item.description:
Journey to the new ROYAL WORLD!

  • Unlock 6 new characters with new abilities, including the Royale King!

  • Take on new Clash Royale themed maps and monsters - cue the trumpets!

BATTLE MODS are shaking things up!

  • Discover 15+ new Battle Mods that twist the rules in every match

  • Maps and Battle Mods change constantly to keep the surprises coming

FUSIONS make Squad building strategy matter more than ever!

  • Combine 3 characters into 1 giant Fusion unit with stronger stats and abilities

  • Building Fusions lowers your Chest cost, helping to keep your Squad growing

Build and decorate your very own PLAZA!

  • Find Magic Hammers in battles to upgrade your Plaza

  • Build Plaza buildings to discover special Gold and Elixir loot in battles

Earn fantastic rewards by conquering the BEGINNER CHALLENGE!

  • Come back every day to earn valuable prizes, including Rare and Epic characters

  • Continue questing with Weekly Quest challenges for more prizes

Experience AMPED-UP ACTION!

  • Encounter more monsters, loot, chests, and action until the timer hits zero

  • Fight or flight? Hold down Turbo to run and attack faster without cooldowns

  • Keep on zooming! Used Turbo now recovers over time

  • Skill-shot! Throw Spells from a distance using the Spell stick

  • Full arsenal! 3 new Spells added, and Spells unlock automatically by advancing worlds

  • Epic comeback! Chests are cheaper, faster and upgrade to give rarer picks over time

  • Last-minute plays! Squad units drop more Gems the more they hold, and Final Stretch doubles all gems drops!

item.title: Let us know how many fusions have you done so far!
Vote for your favorite Mods on Discord!
The beta has ended!
item.description:
The game is currently unavailable, but we wanted to let you know how thankful we are that you hopped on board for this 7-day ride with us ðŸ˜Š

Your participation, feedback, and contributions have been beyond amazing, and we can't express our gratitude enough for you being part of this.

We know you've put a lot of time and effort into playing the game, and while it's a bummer that the progress from this beta won't roll into future versions, please know we've truly appreciated your passion, kindness, and commitment throughout this journey.Â 

A huge THANK YOU from the Squad Busters team ðŸ’œ See you soon!
